tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for Dental Checkup - General
I recommend  Dr. K. Srinivas Reddy, Dr. Saritha Reddy

Hi,  my name is Gurukulam Ram, CEO of Stayfit India,  visited Sri The Dentist in Banjara Hills for General Dental Check up. 

Dr's, Team  took extreme care in making sure I was well informed as to what was going to happen in the procedure , process involved and  the whole treatment went exactly as per plan and there were no complications.
Everything is explained in great detail and as per our convenience.
It is a perfect place for the treatment of dental care and yes the doctors are very friendly and this place has a nice and clean environment of course with good parking facility as well. 

They follow latest methods and explains the problem to the patients very well and treats well. Both the doctors are very polite and friendly as well. They use latest equipment and is maintained well. 

In short Doctors are
Very professional in rendering services. Good ambience. Appointments are convenient . Equipments modern and up to date. Courteous reception .

Excellent in approach . Very happy with Treatment,  personally satisfied. 

 I would highly recommend both the doctors for all Dental Services.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We visited Sri The Dentist Dental Care for my father's artificial teeth. Dr. Saritha did the examination and patiently explained the situation and options available for solution and helped us made the right choice. The product was acquired in the said time and treatment was done smoothly. Best part is after care, she is always available and took care of my father's concerns and feedbacks and accordingly treated again. Overall, it was a pleasant experience and satisfying treatment. Way to go Dr. Saritha and Sri The Dentist. All the best...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The doctor explained the issue in simple terms and gave an unambiguous review of my issue. She made sure that the procedure was done with minimal pain. Further, she also ensured that the feel post procedure was fine and there was no discomfort. 
Overall, i can recommend her to people i care about.

Root Canal Treatment was painless, satisfied with services and explanations of all the doctors involved during procedure. Only one point of dissatisfaction was payment method, as customers need to pay 2% more, if payment is done from credit card or debit card. But if you have google pay, then no extra payment is required.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.saritha is too good and fridenly ********** **** *** **** its a personal effect she took and done treatment to my wife and cheked for my self and a advice to visit a at least once in a year i was glad to no from her inshallah Dr. Saritha will be a my family doctor thanks good luck

Clinic is very good, equipment is top of the class.
Doctor identified the problem, explained to me and suggested treatment.
Partial Treatment is done it has cured my major problem, it has been effective
Staff is very polite, follow up calls were done, reminders were given on time.
Overall a good treatment experience would refer others in need.

Diagnosis was shared with me very clearly. I was heard patiently and was told in detail about all the steps involved and was not forced for any particular treatment. My case was dealt very carefully. While others doctors told that tooth extraction was the only alternative, I was given alternative choice of going for re rct which has been really effective.

I have very yellow teeth because I drink coffee so I came to Sri The Dentist Dental Hospital I done bleaching . I couldn't believe all of the stains and yellowing I had completely disappeared my teeth were literally glowing!! Doctors and staff friendly . thank u doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The experience was good, my issue was addressed and further precautions were provided. Would again visit after 6 months as advised.
Dr. Saritha is very friendly.  Treatment is also very good. No problem faced by my daughter Srijita, during her RCT treatment. She also explained the procedure along with the treatment.
